projectDetails.description:
Redesign of existing Squarespace site for sustainable garden design company. Client wants to update content    
  (unchanged since 2021), improve SEO, and maintain earthy/witchy aesthetic â€” not pristine or minimal. Adding new sections:   
  Meadows, Edibles, Resources page. Blog setup needed but content not ready yet. May add 2 new team members. Client prefers   
  ability to make small edits themselves. Open to staying on Squarespace or going custom.

additionalInfo: Emily unavailable Feb 12-22. Abby only works Mon/Tues. Low cash flow currently, prefer extended payment if needed.
